gramGrp.pos:
UNCOUNT N, COUNT N,
or
MOD

sense.def:
One's home
je kraj ali država, kjer živimo ali čutimo, da tja sodimo.

seg.quote: The old man wants to die in his own home.
He stayed at home to care for the children.
My own home town is thousands of miles away.

sense.def:
Home
pomeni proti kraju, kjer živimo, ali tam.

seg.quote: Here we are, home at last.

sense.def:
Kdor se v določenih okoliščinah počuti
at home
, mu je udobno in je sproščen.

seg.quote: I felt at home at once, because I recognized familiar faces.

sense.def:
Home
pomeni tudi povezan s svojo državo in ne kakšno tujo.

seg.quote: The government had promised to maintain an expanding home market.
Newspapers both at home and abroad ignored the incident.

sense.def:
A home
je tudi stavba, v kateri drugi skrbijo za ljudi, ki ne morejo skrbeti sami zase.

The home of something
je kraj, kjer se je nekaj začelo ali kjer nekaj obstaja.

seg.quote: ...that home of free enterprise, the United States.

sense.def:
To bring something home to someone
ali
to drive something home to someone
pomeni doseči, da nekdo razume, kako pomembno je nekaj.

seg.quote: He raised his voice to drive home the point.

sense.def:
A home game
je tekma, ki jo moštvo igra na svojem igrišču.

seg.quote: They watched every single game, home or away.

sense.def:
Kadar neki izstrelek
homes in on something
, najde cilj.

seg.quote: It can thus home in on the target with pinpoint accuracy.
